title: The Launch: Fashion News to Know This May
excerpt: Plus, more fashion news to know (and shop) this month.
text: May’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. Kicking things off, Aman tapped its wellness advisor Novak Djokovic for the Aman Tennis Club, plus, Giorgi Armani Mare is racing across the world. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.Aman Essentials Launches Aman Tennis ClubCourtesy of AmanWho: Aman EssentialsWhat: Aman Tennis ClubWhere: Online at shop.aman.comWhy: Aman Essentials, the lifestyle and wellness community from the Aman hotel group, is ready for its next chapter on the tennis court. Launched in partnership with its wellness advisor Novak Djokovic, the all-new Aman Tennis Club channels the highest form of athletic excellence. The collection was carefully crafted in Italy and Portugal and features silk-blend dresses, embroidered baseball caps, and terry-cloth separates that will have you feeling like a professional player in no time at all. Aman Oversized Pocket T-ShirtAman Logo HoodieAman Nylon CapGiorgio Armani Sets SailCourtesy of Giorgio Armani MareWho: Giorgio ArmaniWhat: Giorgio Armani Superyacht RegattaWhere: Porto Cervo, Sardinia and Shelter Island, New YorkWhy: Giorgio Armani is taking to the open waters. This summer, its customized boat, Sørvind by Giorgio Armani, will set sail for the fourth edition of the brand’s Superyacht Regatta in support of the One Ocean Foundation. The race will begin on May 27 in Porto Cervo, where the boat will compete for the first time in honor of the Title Sponsor. From there, the Sørvind will travel to Cannes and then to Capri, to celebrate Armani’s newest boutique on the island. Finally, in late July, the boat will land on Shelter Island, where the journey will be commemorated by with a special pop-up restaurant and beach takeover. The excursion encapsulates the essence of the Giorgio Armani Mare collection, which features lightweight, breezy, and tropical designs in a refined, neutral palette, available in boutiques along the sailing route and at select retailers worldwide.Giorgio Armani Dress in Embroidered SilkGiorgio Armani Two-Tone Bandeau BikiniGiorgio Armani Printed Silk Organza TopParsons Graduates Stage Runway ShowCourtesy of Parsons School of FashionWho: Parsons School of Design BFA Fashion Design programWhat: Graduate showWhere: New York CityWhy: Graduation season is here. While New York City parks fill with hopeful graduates posing for photos, the Parsons School of Design took to the former Barneys New York space to stage its annual fashion show for the BFA Fashion Design program. This year’s lineup features over 200 young designers, each presenting a single ensemble that reflects the culmination of their time in school. Standout looks include Dae Um’s inventively athletic suiting, Qingchun Chen’s grungy sailor-meets-schoolboy aesthetic, Yewon Lim’s electric yellow moto jacket, and Beyza Nur Öz’s Victorian-noir theatrics. Rabanne Releases High Summer CollectionCourtesy of RabanneWho: RabanneWhat: High summer 2025 collectionWhere: Online at rabanne.comWhy: This summer, Rabanne takes a journey south with its high summer 2025 collection, offering a nostalgic blend of garments and accessories that evoke the spirit of Rio de Janeiro’s funk music scene. Drawing inspiration from the soul record label Paco Rabanne Design, founded by Spanish-born designer Paco Rabanne in the 1980s, the collection embodies a laid-back, effortless vibe. Expect to see iconic shell-accented 1969 bags, nautical-inspired jewelry, vibrant sunset-hued ensembles, and much more—each piece radiating a sense of freedom and laid-back sartorial ease.Rabanne Gradient Mini SkirtRabanne Jersey Tank TopRabanne Sparkle Nano BagMichael Kors Crafts an Unforgettable Experience With Montauk Yacht ClubCourtesy of Michael KorsWho: Michael KorsWhat: Jet Set hotel packageWhere: Montauk Yacht ClubWhy: The wait is over: The newly renovated Montauk Yacht Club is ready to return. Following last season’s soft launch, the resort and marina is opening its doors just in time for the high season. To celebrate, the property partnered with Michael Kors for an intimate luxury experience filled with fashion, fine dining, and more. Guests who book the Jet Set package will begin their stay with a Michael Kors Bedford weekender bag gifted at check-in. From there, you will be whisked away for a weekend of relaxation, including a bespoke meal curated by chef Jarad McCarroll and a 60-minute massage on a floating cabana, leaving you in a state of vacation bliss. The Jet Set package is available to book from Memorial Day through Labor Day, exclusively at Montauk Yacht Club. Michael Kors Large Fan ToteMichael Kors Stripe Midi DressMichael Kors Espadrille Ballet FlatsSt. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Launch a Global Capsule CollectionCourtesy of St. Regis Hotels & ResortsWho: St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and VilebrequinWhat: Exclusive capsule collectionWhere: Online at vilebrequin.com and st-regis.marriott.comWhy: St. Regis and Vilebrequin are raising the bar for luxury travel. Just in time for warm weather, the two have teamed up for the second time to release an exclusive capsule collaboration filled with swimwear, accessories, and games, all inspired by Vilebrequin’s French Riviera style and St. Regis’s dedication to exquisite experiences. The collection also those to the St. Regis Family Traditions program, which honors the legacy of its founders, the Astor family. In addition to all-new boys’ and girls’ swimsuits, the capsule features a playful range of one-of-a-kind patterns and illustrations. The pieces are available to shop both online and in custom boutique experiences across select global St. Regis Resorts, from Punta Mita to Hong Kong and more. St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Bustier One PieceSt. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Linen Tote BagSt. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Girls One-piece SwimsuitValentino Introduces a Bespoke Audio ExperienceCourtesy of ValentinoWho: ValentinoWhat: L’Atelier SonoreWhere: 654 Madison Avenue, New York CityWhy: This summer, Valentino redefines the retail experience with a sensorial installation at its Madison Avenue flagship. From May 16 through the end of August, the boutique will house L’Atelier Sonore, an immersive listening room that blurs the boundaries between fashion, architecture, and sound. Made in collaboration with Italian cultural collective Terraforma and architect Francesco Lupia, the space features a bespoke sound system and acoustic design intended to heighten the auditory experience. Every element—from the sonic textures to the spatial arrangement—has been considered to create a deeply meditative environment. Open to the public daily from 10 A.M. to 6 P.M., L’Atelier Sonore invites visitors to browse a hand-selected collection of vinyl records, each curated to complement the intimate soundscape.Valentino Cotton T-ShirtNow 60% OffValentino Bouclé ShortsValentino Suede Shoulder BagNow 22% OffReformation and Jimmy Fairly Debut a Limited-Edition Sunglasses CollectionCourtesy of Reformation x Jimmy FairlyWho: Reformation and Jimmy FairlyWhat: Limited-edition collection of sunglassesWhere: Online at reformation.com and select retail locationsWhy: Following the runaway success of its initial release, Reformation has unveiled a second collaboration with French eyewear label Jimmy Fairly—just in time for summer. Designed in Paris and handcrafted in France, the collection blends vintage silhouettes with modern sensibilities, all crafted from 100-percent plant-based, biodegradable bio-acetate. With timeless shapes and a focus on sustainability, the drop has already earned the distinction of being Reformation’s fastest-selling collaboration of 2024.Reformation x Jimmy Fairly The Brune SunglassesReformation x Jimmy Fairly The Jade SunglassesReformation x Jimmy Fairly The Flore SunglassesGiorgio Armani Opens a New Store in CapriCourtesy of Giorgio ArmaniWho: Giorgio ArmaniWhat: New boutiqueWhere: Capri, ItalyWhy: Giorgio Armani returns to the idyllic island of Capri with a new boutique, housed inside the historic Villa Pompeiana—an architectural gem dating back to 1879. The store spans a single floor and unfolds across three distinct rooms, each adorned with blue-and-gold palm motif wallpaper and sand-colored flooring—a nod to the relaxed sophistication of the Giorgio Armani Mare resort aesthetic. Inside, there’s a selection of menswear, womenswear, accessories, fine jewelry, and Giorgio Armani 11 watches, all thoughtfully selected to reflect the spirit of Mediterranean elegance.Giorgio Armani Stripe Wool T-ShirtGiorgio Armani High-Neck Silk Satin GownGiorgio Armani Asymmetric Long-Sleeve TopDolce & Gabbana Collaborates With Havaianas (Again)Courtesy of HavaianasWho: Dolce & Gabbana and HavaianasWhat: Flip-flop collaborationWhere: Online at havaianas.comWhy: Just in time for summer, Dolce & Gabbana reunites with Havaianas for a second installment of their sought-after flip-flop collab. This latest drop fuses Havaianas’ iconic Brazilian craftsmanship with Dolce & Gabbana’s unmistakable visual language—think: bold florals, lush palms, and exotic animal prints. The result is a playful yet luxurious take on warm-weather essentials, where everyday comfort meets high-fashion flair.Dolce&Gabbana Florals Top Flip FlopsDolce&Gabbana Leopard Top Flip FlopsDolce&Gabbana Banano Top Flip FlopsLouis Vuitton Unveils a Custom Trophy Trunk for the Miami Grand PrixCourtesy of Louis VuittonWho: Louis VuittonWhat: Custom trophy trunkWhere: MiamiWhy: Louis Vuitton created a bespoke trophy trunk for the Miami Grand Prix winner—McLaren’s Oscar Piastri—featuring a custom logo designed to honor the iconic racetrack. The trunk showcases Miami’s signature pink and blue hues and is topped with a checkered “V” emblem inspired by a racing finish line, all set against the house’s signature monogram canvas. The presentation comes on the heels of LVMH signing a 10-year partnership deal with Formula 1, further cementing its presence in the world of elite motorsport.Louis Vuitton Speedy Soft 30 CraftyLouis Vuitton Cotteville 16 MontresLouis Vuitton Side Trunk GM Shoulder BagMax Mara Celebrates 10 Years of the Whitney BagCOURTESY OF MAX MARAWho: Max MaraWhat: 10th Anniversary of the Whitney BagWhere: Online at maxmara.comWhy: Max Mara is celebrating its iconic Whitney Bag, inspired by New York City’s Whitney Museum, both of which have 10-year anniversaries in 2025. The bag was created in 2015 alongside the opening of the museum in the Meatpacking District, with a ribbed design that mirrors the Whitney’s facade. Max Mara is going all out for the milestone, with celebrations planned at stores worldwide, as well as a special gala at the Whitney on May 20 to celebrate both the museum and the bag’s anniversary. There’s also a special-edition anniversary collection, which will feature an aluminum calfskin version and 13 new colors of the bag.Max Mara Whitney Bag 6Max Mara Whitney Bag 6Max Mara Whitney Bag 5
html:
May’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. Kicking things off, Aman tapped its wellness advisor Novak Djokovic for the Aman Tennis Club, plus, Giorgi Armani Mare is racing across the world. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.

Aman Essentials Launches Aman Tennis Club

Who: Aman Essentials

What: Aman Tennis Club

Where: Online at shop.aman.com

Why: Aman Essentials, the lifestyle and wellness community from the Aman hotel group, is ready for its next chapter on the tennis court. Launched in partnership with its wellness advisor Novak Djokovic, the all-new Aman Tennis Club channels the highest form of athletic excellence. The collection was carefully crafted in Italy and Portugal and features silk-blend dresses, embroidered baseball caps, and terry-cloth separates that will have you feeling like a professional player in no time at all.

Aman Oversized Pocket T-Shirt

Aman Logo Hoodie

Aman Nylon Cap

Giorgio Armani Sets Sail

Who: Giorgio Armani

What: Giorgio Armani Superyacht Regatta

Where: Porto Cervo, Sardinia and Shelter Island, New York

Why: Giorgio Armani is taking to the open waters. This summer, its customized boat, Sørvind by Giorgio Armani, will set sail for the fourth edition of the brand’s Superyacht Regatta in support of the One Ocean Foundation. The race will begin on May 27 in Porto Cervo, where the boat will compete for the first time in honor of the Title Sponsor. From there, the Sørvind will travel to Cannes and then to Capri, to celebrate Armani’s newest boutique on the island. Finally, in late July, the boat will land on Shelter Island, where the journey will be commemorated by with a special pop-up restaurant and beach takeover. The excursion encapsulates the essence of the Giorgio Armani Mare collection, which features lightweight, breezy, and tropical designs in a refined, neutral palette, available in boutiques along the sailing route and at select retailers worldwide.

Giorgio Armani Dress in Embroidered Silk

Giorgio Armani Two-Tone Bandeau Bikini

Giorgio Armani Printed Silk Organza Top

Parsons Graduates Stage Runway Show

Who: Parsons School of Design BFA Fashion Design program

What: Graduate show

Where: New York City

Why: Graduation season is here. While New York City parks fill with hopeful graduates posing for photos, the Parsons School of Design took to the former Barneys New York space to stage its annual fashion show for the BFA Fashion Design program. This year’s lineup features over 200 young designers, each presenting a single ensemble that reflects the culmination of their time in school. Standout looks include Dae Um’s inventively athletic suiting, Qingchun Chen’s grungy sailor-meets-schoolboy aesthetic, Yewon Lim’s electric yellow moto jacket, and Beyza Nur Öz’s Victorian-noir theatrics.

Rabanne Releases High Summer Collection

Who: Rabanne

What: High summer 2025 collection

Where: Online at rabanne.com

Why: This summer, Rabanne takes a journey south with its high summer 2025 collection, offering a nostalgic blend of garments and accessories that evoke the spirit of Rio de Janeiro’s funk music scene. Drawing inspiration from the soul record label Paco Rabanne Design, founded by Spanish-born designer Paco Rabanne in the 1980s, the collection embodies a laid-back, effortless vibe. Expect to see iconic shell-accented 1969 bags, nautical-inspired jewelry, vibrant sunset-hued ensembles, and much more—each piece radiating a sense of freedom and laid-back sartorial ease.

Rabanne Gradient Mini Skirt

Rabanne Jersey Tank Top

Rabanne Sparkle Nano Bag

Michael Kors Crafts an Unforgettable Experience With Montauk Yacht Club

Who: Michael Kors

What: Jet Set hotel package

Where: Montauk Yacht Club

Why: The wait is over: The newly renovated Montauk Yacht Club is ready to return. Following last season’s soft launch, the resort and marina is opening its doors just in time for the high season. To celebrate, the property partnered with Michael Kors for an intimate luxury experience filled with fashion, fine dining, and more. Guests who book the Jet Set package will begin their stay with a Michael Kors Bedford weekender bag gifted at check-in. From there, you will be whisked away for a weekend of relaxation, including a bespoke meal curated by chef Jarad McCarroll and a 60-minute massage on a floating cabana, leaving you in a state of vacation bliss. The Jet Set package is available to book from Memorial Day through Labor Day, exclusively at Montauk Yacht Club.

Michael Kors Large Fan Tote

Michael Kors Stripe Midi Dress

Michael Kors Espadrille Ballet Flats

St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Launch a Global Capsule Collection

Who: St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin

What: Exclusive capsule collection

Where: Online at vilebrequin.com and st-regis.marriott.com

Why: St. Regis and Vilebrequin are raising the bar for luxury travel. Just in time for warm weather, the two have teamed up for the second time to release an exclusive capsule collaboration filled with swimwear, accessories, and games, all inspired by Vilebrequin’s French Riviera style and St. Regis’s dedication to exquisite experiences. The collection also those to the St. Regis Family Traditions program, which honors the legacy of its founders, the Astor family. In addition to all-new boys’ and girls’ swimsuits, the capsule features a playful range of one-of-a-kind patterns and illustrations. The pieces are available to shop both online and in custom boutique experiences across select global St. Regis Resorts, from Punta Mita to Hong Kong and more.

St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Bustier One Piece

St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Linen Tote Bag

St. Regis Hotels & Resorts and Vilebrequin Girls One-piece Swimsuit

Valentino Introduces a Bespoke Audio Experience

Who: Valentino

What: L’Atelier Sonore

Where: 654 Madison Avenue, New York City

Why: This summer, Valentino redefines the retail experience with a sensorial installation at its Madison Avenue flagship. From May 16 through the end of August, the boutique will house L’Atelier Sonore, an immersive listening room that blurs the boundaries between fashion, architecture, and sound. Made in collaboration with Italian cultural collective Terraforma and architect Francesco Lupia, the space features a bespoke sound system and acoustic design intended to heighten the auditory experience. Every element—from the sonic textures to the spatial arrangement—has been considered to create a deeply meditative environment. Open to the public daily from 10 A.M. to 6 P.M., L’Atelier Sonore invites visitors to browse a hand-selected collection of vinyl records, each curated to complement the intimate soundscape.

Valentino Cotton T-Shirt

Now 60% Off

Valentino Bouclé Shorts

Valentino Suede Shoulder Bag

Now 22% Off

Reformation and Jimmy Fairly Debut a Limited-Edition Sunglasses Collection

Who: Reformation and Jimmy Fairly

What: Limited-edition collection of sunglasses

Where: Online at reformation.com and select retail locations

Why: Following the runaway success of its initial release, Reformation has unveiled a second collaboration with French eyewear label Jimmy Fairly—just in time for summer. Designed in Paris and handcrafted in France, the collection blends vintage silhouettes with modern sensibilities, all crafted from 100-percent plant-based, biodegradable bio-acetate. With timeless shapes and a focus on sustainability, the drop has already earned the distinction of being Reformation’s fastest-selling collaboration of 2024.

Reformation x Jimmy Fairly The Brune Sunglasses

Reformation x Jimmy Fairly The Jade Sunglasses

Reformation x Jimmy Fairly The Flore Sunglasses

Giorgio Armani Opens a New Store in Capri

Who: Giorgio Armani

What: New boutique

Where: Capri, Italy

Why: Giorgio Armani returns to the idyllic island of Capri with a new boutique, housed inside the historic Villa Pompeiana—an architectural gem dating back to 1879. The store spans a single floor and unfolds across three distinct rooms, each adorned with blue-and-gold palm motif wallpaper and sand-colored flooring—a nod to the relaxed sophistication of the Giorgio Armani Mare resort aesthetic. Inside, there’s a selection of menswear, womenswear, accessories, fine jewelry, and Giorgio Armani 11 watches, all thoughtfully selected to reflect the spirit of Mediterranean elegance.

Giorgio Armani Stripe Wool T-Shirt

Giorgio Armani High-Neck Silk Satin Gown

Giorgio Armani Asymmetric Long-Sleeve Top

Dolce & Gabbana Collaborates With Havaianas (Again)

Who: Dolce & Gabbana and Havaianas

What: Flip-flop collaboration

Where: Online at havaianas.com

Why: Just in time for summer, Dolce & Gabbana reunites with Havaianas for a second installment of their sought-after flip-flop collab. This latest drop fuses Havaianas’ iconic Brazilian craftsmanship with Dolce & Gabbana’s unmistakable visual language—think: bold florals, lush palms, and exotic animal prints. The result is a playful yet luxurious take on warm-weather essentials, where everyday comfort meets high-fashion flair.

Dolce&Gabbana Florals Top Flip Flops

Dolce&Gabbana Leopard Top Flip Flops

Dolce&Gabbana Banano Top Flip Flops

Louis Vuitton Unveils a Custom Trophy Trunk for the Miami Grand Prix

Who: Louis Vuitton

What: Custom trophy trunk

Where: Miami

Why: Louis Vuitton created a bespoke trophy trunk for the Miami Grand Prix winner—McLaren’s Oscar Piastri—featuring a custom logo designed to honor the iconic racetrack. The trunk showcases Miami’s signature pink and blue hues and is topped with a checkered “V” emblem inspired by a racing finish line, all set against the house’s signature monogram canvas. The presentation comes on the heels of LVMH signing a 10-year partnership deal with Formula 1, further cementing its presence in the world of elite motorsport.

Louis Vuitton Speedy Soft 30 Crafty

Louis Vuitton Cotteville 16 Montres

Louis Vuitton Side Trunk GM Shoulder Bag

Max Mara Celebrates 10 Years of the Whitney Bag

Who: Max Mara

What: 10th Anniversary of the Whitney Bag

Where: Online at maxmara.com

Why: Max Mara is celebrating its iconic Whitney Bag, inspired by New York City’s Whitney Museum, both of which have 10-year anniversaries in 2025. The bag was created in 2015 alongside the opening of the museum in the Meatpacking District, with a ribbed design that mirrors the Whitney’s facade. Max Mara is going all out for the milestone, with celebrations planned at stores worldwide, as well as a special gala at the Whitney on May 20 to celebrate both the museum and the bag’s anniversary. There’s also a special-edition anniversary collection, which will feature an aluminum calfskin version and 13 new colors of the bag.

Max Mara Whitney Bag 6

Max Mara Whitney Bag 6

Max Mara Whitney Bag 5
